CustomField.description: Tier Name in language of the logged in user (for use in flow - Manage Renewals)
CustomField.formula:
CASE( $User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c ,
"English", CASE( Tier_Number__c , "1", "ROOFPRO Preferred", "2", "ROOFPRO Select", "3", "ROOFPRO Craftsman Premier", "0", "Advantage", ""),
"Quebec French", CASE(Tier_Number__c, "1", "ROOFPRO Privilège", "2", "ROOFPRO Sélect", "3", "ROOFPRO Maître Artisan", "0", "Avantage", ""),
"")
CustomField.label: Tier Name
